description: Try our easy to follow Black Forest Muffins recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Black Forest Muffins Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 415g can stoneless black cherries in syrup

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a 12 hole medium muffin pan with paper cases.

Using an electric beater, beat butter and sugar until light and creamy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Sift flour, cocoa and baking soda over mixture. Add milk, and using a large metal spoon, gently stir until well combined. Add chocolate and cherries and fold through cake mixture.

Divide mixture between cases until three-quarters full. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until cooked through when tested with a skewer. Cool on a wire rack. Combine cocoa and icing sugar in a small bowl. Serve muffins dusted with cocoa mixture.
